verses.verse: Then came<WH935> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> even the whole<WH3605> congregation,<WH5712> into the desert<WH4057> of Zin<WH6790> in the first<WH7223> month:<WH2320> and the people<WH5971> abode<WH3427> in Kadesh;<WH6946> and Miriam<WH4813> died<WH4191> there,<WH8033> and was buried<WH6912> there.<WH8033>
And there was<WH1961> no<WH3808> water<WH4325> for the congregation:<WH5712> and they gathered themselves together<WH6950> against<WH5921> Moses<WH4872> and against<WH5921> Aaron.<WH175>

And the people<WH5971> chided<WH7378> with<WH5973> Moses,<WH4872> and spoke,<WH559> saying,<WH559> Would God<WH3863> that we had died<WH1478> when our brethren<WH251> died<WH1478> before<WH6440> the LORD!<WH3068>

And why<WH4100> have ye brought up<WH935> <WH853> the congregation<WH6951> of the Lord<WH3068> into<WH413> this<WH2088> wilderness,<WH4057> that we<WH587> and our cattle<WH1165> should die<WH4191> there?<WH8033>

And wherefore<WH4100> have ye made us to come up<WH5927> out of Egypt,<WH4480> <WH4714> to bring us in<WH935> <WH853> unto<WH413> this<WH2088> evil<WH7451> place?<WH4725> it is no<WH3808> place<WH4725> of seed,<WH2233> or of figs,<WH8384> or of vines,<WH1612> or of pomegranates;<WH7416> neither<WH369> is there any water<WH4325> to drink.<WH8354>

And Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> went<WH935> from the presence<WH4480> <WH6440> of the assembly<WH6951> unto<WH413> the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation,<WH4150> and they fell<WH5307> upon<WH5921> their faces:<WH6440> and the glory<WH3519> of the LORD<WH3068> appeared<WH7200> unto<WH413> them.
And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

Take <WH3947> <WH853> the rod,<WH4294> and gather thou the assembly together,<WH6950> <WH853> <WH5712> thou,<WH859> and Aaron<WH175> thy brother,<WH251> and speak<WH1696> ye unto<WH413> the rock<WH5553> before their eyes;<WH5869> and it shall give forth<WH5414> his water,<WH4325> and thou shalt bring forth<WH3318> to them water<WH4325> out of<WH4480> the rock:<WH5553> so thou shalt give<WH853> the congregation<WH5712> and their beasts<WH1165> drink.<WH8248>
And Moses<WH4872> took<WH3947> <WH853> the rod<WH4294> from before<WH4480> <WH6440> the LORD,<WH3068> as<WH834> he commanded<WH6680> him.

And Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> gathered the congregation together<WH6950> <WH853> <WH6951> before<WH413> <WH6440> the rock,<WH5553> and he said<WH559> unto them, Hear<WH8085> now,<WH4994> ye rebels;<WH4784> must we fetch<WH3318> you water<WH4325> out of<WH4480> this<WH2088> rock?<WH5553>

And Moses<WH4872> lifted up<WH7311> <WH853> his hand,<WH3027> and with his rod<WH4294> he smote<WH5221> <WH853> the rock<WH5553> twice:<WH6471> and the water<WH4325> came out<WH3318> abundantly,<WH7227> and the congregation<WH5712> drank,<WH8354> and their beasts<WH1165> also.

And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH559> unto<WH413> Moses<WH4872> and Aaron,<WH175> Because<WH3282> ye believed<WH539> me not,<WH3808> to sanctify<WH6942> me in the eyes<WH5869> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> therefore<WH3651> ye shall not<WH3808> bring<WH935> <WH853> this<WH2088> congregation<WH6951> into<WH413> the land<WH776> which<WH834> I have given<WH5414> them.
This <WH1992> is the water<WH4325> of Meribah;<WH4809> because<WH834> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> strove<WH7378> with<WH854> the LORD,<WH3068> and he was sanctified<WH6942> in them.

And Moses<WH4872> sent<WH7971> messengers<WH4397> from Kadesh<WH4480> <WH6946> unto<WH413> the king<WH4428> of Edom,<WH123> Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> thy brother<WH251> Israel,<WH3478> Thou<WH859> knowest<WH3045> <WH853> all<WH3605> the travail<WH8513> that<WH834> hath befallen<WH4672> us:
How our fathers<WH1> went down<WH3381> into Egypt,<WH4714> and we have dwelt<WH3427> in Egypt<WH4714> a long<WH7227> time;<WH3117> and the Egyptians<WH4714> vexed<WH7489> us, and our fathers: <WH1>

And when we cried<WH6817> unto<WH413> the LORD,<WH3068> he heard<WH8085> our voice,<WH6963> and sent<WH7971> an angel,<WH4397> and hath brought us forth<WH3318> out of Egypt:<WH4480> <WH4714> and, behold,<WH2009> we<WH587> are in Kadesh,<WH6946> a city<WH5892> in the uttermost<WH7097> of thy border: <WH1366>

Let us pass,<WH5674> I pray thee,<WH4994> through thy country:<WH776> we will not<WH3808> pass through<WH5674> the fields,<WH7704> or through the vineyards,<WH3754> neither<WH3808> will we drink<WH8354> of the water<WH4325> of the wells:<WH875> we will go<WH1980> by the king's<WH4428> high way,<WH1870> we will not<WH3808> turn<WH5186> to the right hand<WH3225> nor to the left,<WH8040> until<WH5704> <WH834> we have passed<WH5674> thy borders.<WH1366>
And Edom<WH123> said<WH559> unto<WH413> him, Thou shalt not<WH3808> pass<WH5674> by me, lest<WH6435> I come out<WH3318> against<WH7125> thee with the sword.<WH2719>

And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> said<WH559> unto<WH413> him, We will go<WH5927> by the high way:<WH4546> and if<WH518> I<WH589> and my cattle<WH4735> drink<WH8354> of thy water,<WH4325> then I will pay<WH5414> <WH4377> for it: I will only,<WH7535> without<WH369> doing any thing<WH1697> else, go through<WH5674> on my feet.<WH7272>
And he said,<WH559> Thou shalt not<WH3808> go through.<WH5674> And Edom<WH123> came out<WH3318> against<WH7125> him with much<WH3515> people,<WH5971> and with a strong<WH2389> hand.<WH3027>
Thus Edom<WH123> refused<WH3985> to give<WH5414> <WH853> Israel<WH3478> passage<WH5674> through his border:<WH1366> wherefore Israel<WH3478> turned away<WH5186> from<WH4480> <WH5921> him.
And the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> even the whole<WH3605> congregation,<WH5712> journeyed<WH5265> from Kadesh,<WH4480> <WH6946> and came<WH935> unto mount<WH2022> Hor.<WH2023>
And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH559> unto<WH413> Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> in mount<WH2022> Hor,<WH2023> by<WH5921> the coast<WH1366> of the land<WH776> of Edom,<WH123> saying,<WH559>

Aaron <WH175> shall be gathered<WH622> unto<WH413> his people:<WH5971> for<WH3588> he shall not<WH3808> enter<WH935> into<WH413> the land<WH776> which<WH834> I have given<WH5414> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> because<WH5921> <WH834> ye rebelled against<WH4784> <WH853> my word<WH6310> at the water<WH4325> of Meribah.<WH4809>
Take <WH3947> <WH853> Aaron<WH175> and Eleazar<WH499> his son,<WH1121> and bring them up<WH5927> <WH853> unto mount<WH2022> Hor: <WH2023>

And strip<WH6584> <WH853> Aaron<WH175> <WH853> of his garments,<WH899> and put them upon<WH3847> <WH853> Eleazar<WH499> his son:<WH1121> and Aaron<WH175> shall be gathered<WH622> unto his people, and shall die<WH4191> there.<WH8033>

And Moses<WH4872> did<WH6213> as<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> commanded:<WH6680> and they went up<WH5927> into<WH413> mount<WH2022> Hor<WH2023> in the sight<WH5869> of all<WH3605> the congregation.<WH5712>

And Moses<WH4872> stripped<WH6584> <WH853> Aaron<WH175> <WH853> of his garments,<WH899> and put them upon<WH3847> <WH853> <WH853> Eleazar<WH499> his son;<WH1121> and Aaron<WH175> died<WH4191> there<WH8033> in the top<WH7218> of the mount:<WH2022> and Moses<WH4872> and Eleazar<WH499> came down<WH3381> from<WH4480> the mount.<WH2022>

And when all<WH3605> the congregation<WH5712> saw<WH7200> that<WH3588> Aaron<WH175> was dead,<WH1478> they mourned<WH1058> for<WH853> Aaron<WH175> thirty<WH7970> days,<WH3117> even all<WH3605> the house<WH1004> of Israel.<WH3478>
